grow_event_type_mushi/3901_1301_0100_10:
Are you here to ask me for a battle, too? If you
are, let’s see who lady luck favors... This should
be interesting.
grow_event_type_mushi/3902_1031_0100_10:
An all-out battle once in
a while isn’t so bad.
grow_event_type_mushi/3902_1301_0100_10:
Where there’s a winner, there’s also a loser.
That’s what a battle is.
grow_event_type_mushi/3903_1301_0100_10:
All right! Candice is gonna give you some special
training! Show me that focus!
